posts.author: Vandayer
posts.content:
I was directed here by a friend of mine as he said you guys are excellent at helping those of us who aren't adept at character building.

--This is a PvM build as it is just for a group of people that I get together with a couple of times a week. We use our own server to play on so there will be little if any PvP ever.
--Level cap is 40
--Must be a dwarf of course (our whole group is dwarven)
--I chose the three classes for various reasons. Paladin because the server is based around Dragons and we will be facing them quite often. I like the immunity to fear. Rogue because of Tumble and UMD, plus I'd love to some how achieve Epic Dodge with this build. Dwarven Defender because, well, he is a a dwarf!
--Dex build since the goal is Epic Dodge.
--Being that is is a dex build I was thinking of using either 2 hand axes or 2 short swords.. I'd also be open to using a weapon/shield combo as survival is always a goal, hence the DwD aspect of the build.
--High magic setting. Several items +5 , even a few "artifacts" that are higher.
--Im not too concerned with spell casting. Only divine casters are allowed in our world setting. One of our group is playing a cleric so I can snag buffs there.

As I said earlier this guy will be played on a server that is ravaged by dragons, so they will be a constant enemy which is why I choose paladin to get the fear immunity.

Anyways, if this isn't possible or if it would be gimped too much by the things I want, just let me know and I'll figure something else out.

Thanks in advance.

-- Van
